mapper.select: select state.id,problemId,username as authorName,state.authorId,date,language,state,cast(memoryCost/1024/1024 as decimal(10,0)) as memoryCost,timeCost from state,user where authorId=user.id order by date desc limit #{start},#{num}
select state.id,problemId,username as authorName,date,language,state,cast(memoryCost/1024/1024 as decimal(10,0)) as memoryCost,timeCost,code from state,user where authorId=user.id and state.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into state (problemId, authorId, date, language, state, memoryCost, timeCost, code) values (#{problemId},#{authorId},#{date},#{language},'pd','0','0',#{code});
mapper.select: select id,problemId,authorId,code from state where state='pd';
mapper.update: update state set state=#{state},compileInfo=#{compileInfo} where id=#{id};
update state set timeCost=#{timeCost} where id=#{id}
update state set memoryCost=#{memoryCost} where id=#{id}
